title: Silver 4/5 looking for DUO BOT next few days
body:
Tanked points last few days from chilling with my B5 homie, just want some good games back to S4 or beyond. Support or ADC. Much chill, no rage =D

IGN: Coszack

Peace

replies.body: Hi, I'm silver II, looking to play casual ranked games with the hope of winning. I can adc or support, which ever you prefer. I try my best not to rage, music helps, but I find duo'ing with a parter works the best, because I know there is at least one person I can count on not to be a complete muppet. Let me know if you're interested, my summoner name is Scottle Crab  :)
